notes: Keep dry and cool if dormant. Prone to iron chlorosis.
Grow in spaghnum moss. Susceptible to root rot.
Winter rest period: allow plant to just dry out between waterings.
Winter rest period: allow plant to dry completely; cold (~50-60°).
Water very rarely in winter. Susceptible to root rot in cool conditions.
Keep fairly dry when cool. Susceptible to mealy bugs.
Susceptible to spider mites; keep dust off of leaves.
Winter rest period: allow plant to just dry out between waterings. Give warm showers while growing.
Drought tolerant. Allow to dry completely in winter. Prefers to be rootbound.
